Menteri PPPA dan Wamenag Hadiri HUT Niciren Syosyu Indonesia
03 Nov 2019, 07:13 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Menteri Pemberdayaan Perempuan dan Perlindungan Anak (PPPA) I Gusti Ayu Bintang Darmavati dan Wamenag Zainut Tauhid menghadiri acara HUT ke-55 Parisadha Budha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (NSI). Acara itu nantinya berlangsung dengan gerak jalan yang diikuti oleh Bintang dan Zainut serta umat Budha.
Pantauan detikcom, Bintang dan Zainut sudah tiba di lokasi di kantor Kemenag RI, Jalan MH Thamrin, Jakarta Pusat, Minggu (3/10/2019) sekitar pukul 06.30 WIB, Dia nantinya akan mengikuti acara gerak jalan yang dilakukan oleh NSI.
Ketua Umum NSI Maha Pandita Utama Suhadi mengatakan sekitar 4 ribu peserta yang hadir. Peserta dalam acara gerak jalan berasal dari Jabodetabek.


Foto: HUT Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (Wildan/detikcom)

"Kami libatkan yang paling depan rombongan yang gunakan kostum daerah ada 34 kostum daerah, marching band dan ada rombongan kesenian daerah lebih kurang 120 ibu-ibu pemainan angklung," kata Suhadi di lokasi, Minggu, (3/11/2019).
Acara itu nantinya gerak jalan itu akan mengitari area Car Free Day (CFD) Jalan MH Thamrin ke Patung Kuda. Kemudian rombongan gerak jalan itu akan kembali ke gedung Kemenag.

(sam/fdu)

Minister of PPPA and Deputy Minister of Trade Attended the Anniversary of Niciren Syosyu Indonesia
03 Nov 2019, 07:13 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Minister of Women's Empowerment and Child Protection (PPPA) I Gusti Ayu Bintang Darmavati and Deputy Minister of Religion Zainut Tauhid attended the 55th anniversary of Parisadha Buddha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (NSI). The event will take place with a walk followed by Bintang and Zainut and Buddhists.
Monitoring AFP, Bintang and Zainut have arrived at the location in the office of the Ministry of Religion of the Republic of Indonesia, Jalan MH Thamrin, Central Jakarta, Sunday (3/10/2019) around 06.30 West Indonesia Time, He will later participate in a hiking program conducted by NSI.
Chairman of NSI Maha Pandita Utama Suhadi said around 4 thousand participants were present. Participants in the hiking walk came from Jabodetabek.


Photo: Anniversary of Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (Wildan / detikcom)

"We involved the front of the group that used local costumes there were 34 regional costumes, marching bands and there were regional art groups of approximately 120 angklung playing mothers," Suhadi said at the location on Sunday (11/03/2019).
The program will later move around the Car Free Day (CFD) area of Jalan MH Thamrin to the Horse Statue. Then the group will go back to the Ministry of Religion building.

(sam / fdu)
